title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy radio series+books
description:
This are the first two "fits" (or seasons) for THHGTTG original radio series. There is a third, but its not written by Douglas Adams and has different actors. Besides, the first two series have a nice ending, so for me this is the "complete" series.

The radio series was created before the books, and, for me, its the superior version, but I also included the books, so you be the judge.

Contents: - 12 episodes (half an hour each) from the radio series.
          - Transcripts for every episode.
          - The books (as an extra).


Enjoy!
